dataset_id.description: The ID by which the movie file(s) are known in SMRT Link
dataset_id.name: dataset ID
dataset_id.comment: Users can use this ID to find a movie in SMRT Link to view or delete it

date_run.description: The start time of the run which included this movie
date_run.name: run date

user_name.description: The name of user who submitted the movie
user_name.name: submitted by

num_shares.description: The number of access rules granting access to this movie's path
num_shares.name: shares
num_shares.pop-up label: `Share movie' if num_shares = 0, num_shares if num_shares > 0

num_analyses.description: The number of analyses associated with this movie
num_analyses.name: analyses

backup_device.description: The name of the backup device, if any, else "None"
backup_device.name: backup

backup_date.description: The date on which the movie was backed up, if any, else "n/a"
backup_date.name: backup date

is_online.description: Whether or not movie is available in Globus ("Yes" or "No")
is_online.name: Online
